title: Using Multiplication Property of Inequality
text: Multiply $$\frac{5}{3}$$ on both sides of the ienquality. Then, simplify to get $$z>-25$$.

title: Writing the Left Endpoint
text: Since the inequality includes a greater than symbol, >, we will need to use a bracket to denote the left endpoint.

title: Writing the Right Endpoint
text: There is no upper end to the solution to this inequality so we express it using the $$\infty$$ symbol.

title: Displaying Final Interval Notation
text: What is the interval notation for the inequality?
